snippet.title: Steel Seed | Release Date Announcement Trailer | Coming April 10 | Demo Available Now
snippet.description:
Sci-Fi Stealth-Action Adventure Steel Seed is launching on April 10 on PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store, as well as PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. Check out the game’s new trailer for a glimpse of the sci-fi stealth-action gameplay, parkour, and storytelling that await!

Wishlist now: 
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/458430/Steel_Seed/
PlayStation - https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10010794/
Epic Games Store - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/steel-seed-cdc5d9
Xbox - Soon

Can’t hold on till then? Play Steel Seed’s new Steam demo, available now until the game’s official launch. Explore the game’s introduction, experiencing key mechanics like stealth action, epic battles, and more. Play it now!

Steam Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3002050/Steel_Seed_Demo/

———————————————————

Steel Seed is a stealth-action adventure set in a dark sci-fi world on the brink of extinction. Play as Zoe and her drone Koby as they explore a hostile underground facility. Uncover secrets, survive dangers, search for answers, and humanity’s last hope.

Follow ESDigital Games for the latest news:
https://linktr.ee/ESDGames

#videogames #steelseed #stealth
